entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenApi generate wrong interface when passing wrong --assembly-reference path #40639
  • `dotnet workload uninstall` cannot find workload returned by `dotnet workload list` #40631
  • `dotnet workload clean` is fails due to invalid package signature #40629

Closed

  • `dotnet tool install` ignores $DOTNET_ROOT and defaults to $HOME/.dotnet #39019
  • CONTAINER2005 error raised by containing publishing if project name is all capital letters #40501
  • `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` version '8.0.202' warning is incorrect on `8.0.1xx` SDK #39931
  • Directories with a dot as the first character of the directory name not included in published container images #40511

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #40644
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40643
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #40642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow through generated container image names to callers #40638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] update warning message for containers package inclusion #40628
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Update branding to 6.0.423 #40610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.131 #40609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.106 #40614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.301 #40616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix dotnet/msbuild#10004 by making TL quiet on dotnet new's implicit restore #40630
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix CONTAINER2005 error from all caps project name #40626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix missing files from container images when directory name starts with dot #40624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the pool for linux shortstack builds #40627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CONTAINER2005 error from all caps project name #40512
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix missing files from container images when directory name starts with dot #40513
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Prevent the Roslyn compiler package from being used on .NET Core MSBuild #39666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Have --no-restore imply -restore:false to override any response file command-line arguments #40579
    untriaged, Area-CLI
